verbs.description: The picture [V: was] shared by the leader just days after President Trump pulled the US out of the Iran nuclear deal - sparking outrage in Iran as politicians set fire to the American flag .

[ARG1: The picture] was [V: shared] [ARG0: by the leader] [ARGM-TMP: just days after President Trump pulled the US out of the Iran nuclear deal - sparking outrage in Iran as politicians set fire to the American flag] .

The picture was shared by the leader just days after [ARG0: President Trump] [V: pulled] [ARG1: the US] [ARG2: out of the Iran nuclear deal] - sparking outrage in Iran as politicians set fire to the American flag .

The picture was shared by the leader just days after President Trump pulled the US out of the Iran nuclear deal - [V: sparking] [ARG1: outrage in Iran] [ARGM-TMP: as politicians set fire to the American flag] .

The picture was shared by the leader just days after President Trump pulled the US out of the Iran nuclear deal - sparking outrage in Iran as [ARG0: politicians] [V: set] [ARG1: fire] [ARG2: to the American flag] .
